segments.text: Mr Ludlow , hello . It's good to see you again . What can we do for you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , I'm sorry it's been such a long time . I've been away on business . I'd like to discount this .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem . Could I please see the bill and all of the other documents ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , sure . Here they are . Take your time going through them , I'm in no hurry .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There's no problem here , everything's in order . I can transact that for you now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do I need to pay anything ? Like a handling fee , or something ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , you don't need to pay anything on top . We just simply deduct the discounting interest .
segments.speaker: S1
